TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChangeFeedEventHost extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Simple host for distributing change feed events across observers and thus allowing these observers scale. It distributes the load across its instances and allows dynamic scaling: - Partitions in partitioned collections are distributed across instances/observers. - New instance takes leases from existing instances to make distribution equal. - If an instance dies, the leases are distributed across remaining instances. It's useful for scenario when partition count is high so that one host/VM is not capable of processing that many change feed events. Client application needs to implement and register processor implementation with ChangeFeedEventHost.
Docs.remarks: It uses auxiliary document collection for managing leases for a partition. Every EventProcessorHost instance is performing the following two tasks: 1) Renew Leases: It keeps track of leases currently owned by the host and continuously keeps on renewing the leases. 2) Acquire Leases: Each instance continuously polls all leases to check if there are any leases it should acquire for the system to get into balanced state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<int64> GetEstimatedRemainingWork() cil managed

Docs.summary: Asynchronously checks the current existing leases and calculates an estimate of remaining work per leased partitions.
Docs.returns: An estimate amount of remaining documents to be processed

Docs.summary: Gets the host name, which is a unique name for the instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task RegisterObserverAsync<.ctor (class Microsoft.Azure.Documents.ChangeFeedProcessor.IChangeFeedObserver) T>() cil managed

Docs.typeparam: Implementation of your application-specific event observer.
Docs.summary: Asynchronously registers the observer interface implementation with the host. This method also starts the host and enables it to start participating in the partition distribution process.
Docs.returns: A task indicating that the instance has started.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task RegisterObserverFactoryAsync(class Microsoft.Azure.Documents.ChangeFeedProcessor.IChangeFeedObserverFactory factory) cil managed

Docs.param: Implementation of your application-specific event observer factory.
Docs.summary: Asynchronously registers the observer factory implementation with the host. This method also starts the host and enables it to start participating in the partition distribution process.
Docs.returns: A task indicating that the instance has started.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task UnregisterObserversAsync() cil managed

Docs.summary: Asynchronously shuts down the host instance. This method maintains the leases on all partitions currently held, and enables each host instance to shut down cleanly by invoking the method with object.
Docs.returns: A task that indicates the host instance has stopped.
